keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:burning
keywords.description: A damage over time effect that decays by half each turn.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:constrict
keywords.description: A debuff that deals damage at the end of each turn, and does not decay.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:corruption
keywords.description: A status effect that increases both damage done and taken from attacks.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:deteriorate
keywords.description: A debuff that deals damage equal to the player's Corruption at the end of each turn. Deteriorating entities do not get the damage bonus from their own Corruption.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:fatigue
keywords.description: A 1 cost Curse that retains, and saps your energy at the start of each turn.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:purge
keywords.description: A 2 cost skill that removes Corruption.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:rebuff
keywords.description: A 1 cost skill that reduces Corruption and gives Block.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:shadows
keywords.description: A 1 cost skill that makes you Intangible, but shuffles a curse into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Theshadethatfades:wither
keywords.description: A debuff that prevents other debuffs from decaying over time.
